author: Simon Difford
description: Zesty orange, liquorice and honey combine with bourbon in this delicious riff on a classic Old Fashioned.
name: Old Bank
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
